overview: Ramana has fifteen years of work experience in the technology sector, ranging from design engineering and technology investment banking to technology start-ups. Earlier Ramana worked with Viant as a Strategy Lead in San Francisco to implement digital initiatives of Fortune 500 companies and high-technology start-ups. Prior to Viant, Ramana worked as a Summer Associate for Chase H&Q in London, U.K., in the Mergers and Acquisitions group. Ramana began his career and worked as a Lead Design Engineer for 7 years with Rockwell International in the Control and Communications Group. Currently, Ramana is a member of the Board of Directors of CebaTech, Velox Semiconductor, and Lightspeed Audio, and was Board member of HydroGlobe (acquired by Graver Technologies). Ramana holds an MBA from London Business School, and graduated with distinction with a BS in Electronics Engineering from Pune University, India.
